languages.text: {n}Старуха замирает, резко распахнув глаза-блюдца за линзами окуляров. Тишину тягостного молчания нарушает лишь назойливая муха, вьющаяся над ее головой.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Это... другое{/d}, Ваша Светлость. В данный момент моя работа не имеет прямого отношения к учетным архивам. Убедительно прошу вас ответить на вышеозначенный вопрос".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старуха замирает, резко распахнув глаза-блюдца за линзами окуляров. Тишину тягостного молчания нарушает лишь назойливая муха, вьющаяся над ее головой.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Это... другое{/d}, Ваша Светлость. В данный момент моя работа не имеет прямого отношения к учетным архивам. Убедительно прошу вас ответить на вышеозначенный вопрос".

languages.text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau erstarrt, und ihre Augen hinter den Okularlinsen treten hervor. Das einzige Geräusch in der bleiernen Stille ist eine störende Fliege, die über deinem Kopf kreist.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Das ... ist etwas anderes{/d}, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. In meiner aktuellen Funktion bin ich nicht mit dem Registraturarchiv befasst. Ich bitte Euch, die vorherige Frage zu beantworten."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau erstarrt, und ihre Augen hinter den Okularlinsen treten hervor. Das einzige Geräusch in der bleiernen Stille ist eine störende Fliege, die über deinem Kopf kreist.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Das ... ist etwas anderes{/d}, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. In meiner aktuellen Funktion bin ich nicht mit dem Registraturarchiv befasst. Ich bitte Euch, die vorherige Frage zu beantworten."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme se fige, les yeux subitement écarquillés derrière ses lorgnons mécaniques. Seul le bourdonnement agaçant d'une mouche vient troubler le silence à couper au couteau.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}La... la question n'est pas là{/d}, Votre Seigneurie. Dans le cadre de ma fonction actuelle, je ne suis pas directement affiliée aux services d'état civil. Veuillez répondre à la question, je vous prie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

Seul le bourdonnement agaçant d'une mouche vient troubler le silence à couper au couteau.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}La... la question n'est pas là, Votre Seigneurie. Dans le cadre de ma fonction actuelle, je ne suis pas directement affiliée aux services d'état civil. Veuillez répondre à la question, je vous prie. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人愣住了，镜片后面的眼珠仿佛要鼓了出来。一只恼人的苍蝇在你头上没完没了地飞来飞去，嗡嗡声打破了沉重的寂静。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}那……那是另外一回事{/d}，大人。以我目前的身份而言，我不会直接参与档案的管理工作。我敦促您回答我的问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人愣住了，镜片后面的眼珠仿佛要鼓了出来。一只恼人的苍蝇在你头上没完没了地飞来飞去，嗡嗡声打破了沉重的寂静。{/n}“那……那是另外一回事，大人。以我目前的身份而言，我不会直接参与档案的管理工作。我敦促您回答我的问题。”

languages.text: {n}La anciana se queda petrificada, con los ojos como platos tras sus lentes oculares. El único sonido que se escucha en el pesado silencio es una mosca rondando tu cabeza.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Ese... es otro tema{/d}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En mi puesto actual, no estoy directamente involucrada con los archivos de registro. Le ruego que responda a la pregunta».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

El único sonido que se escucha en el pesado silencio es una mosca rondando tu cabeza.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Ese... es otro tema{/d}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. En mi puesto actual, no estoy directamente involucrada con los archivos de registro. Le ruego que responda a la pregunta».

languages.text: {n}老女はその場に凍りつき、眼鏡の奥の目を大きく見開いた。重苦しい沈黙の中に響くのは、頭上を飛び回る鬱陶しいハエの羽音だけだった。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}それは…別件です{/d}、閣下。現在の私の権限におきましては、記録保管所に直に関与してはおりません。先に述べた質問にお答えいただくようお願いします」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. The only sound amid the heavy silence is an annoying fly circling over your head.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}That... is another matter{/d}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女はその場に凍りつき、眼鏡の奥の目を大きく見開いた。重苦しい沈黙の中に響くのは、頭上を飛び回る鬱陶しいハエの羽音だけだった。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}それは…別件です{/d}、閣下。現在の私の権限におきましては、記録保管所に直に関与してはおりません。先に述べた質問にお答えいただくようお願いします」

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, olduğu yerde donup kalıyor ve oküler mercekleri ardındaki gözleri birden açılıyor. Ortamdaki ağır sessizliği bozan tek şey ise başının etrafında uçuşan sini bozucu sinek oluyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Bu... Başka bir mesele{/d} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şu anki vazifem neticesinde kayıt arşivleriyle doğrudan ilgilenmemekteyim. Sorulan soruyu cevaplamanızı rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman freezes in place, her eyes suddenly bulging behind her ocular lenses. In my current capacity, I am not directly involved with registry archives. I urge you to answer the aforementioned question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, olduğu yerde donar kalır ve oküler mercekleri ardındaki gözleri birden açılır. Ortamdaki ağır sessizliği bozan tek şey ise başının etrafında uçuşan sini bozucu sinektir.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:APA_KnowPrefectDecision}Bu... Başka bir mesele{/d}, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şu anki vazifem neticesinde kayıt arşivleriyle doğrudan ilgilenmemekteyim. Sorulan soruyu cevaplamanızı rica ediyorum."
